entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
